thread.title: stayed for a business trip in March, 2017
thread.title_full: stayed for a business trip in March, 2017 - Review of Pullman Paris Centre - Bercy, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Galyna2017
title: stayed for a business trip in March, 2017
text:
very noisy, the window didnot closed properly, something was broken. air conditioner was not working. after asking at Reception to fix or change the room. pretty girl said they would do something but nothing happened. After second request to another receptionist two men spent the whole day in the room trying to fix, I had to spend time outside, After coming back in the evening it still was not working, at Reception I heard again the same from the very begininng: we'll try to do something.
Another man came and fixed living room dirty.
The whole day the room could not be used, I had to go up and down several times to ask for help.
I saw the first time such type of service despitet travelling a lot.
